title: Controllable Fluid and Smoke Simulations
description: The paper "Primal-Dual Optimization for Fluids" is available here: http://www.ntoken.com/pubs.html An introduction to fluid simulations and fluid control with source code, both CPU and GPU (OpenCL): 1. https://users.cg.tuwien.ac.at/zsolnai... 2. https://users.cg.tuwien.ac.at/zsolnai... Doyub Kim's book on fluid simulations, with source code: http://doyub.com/ https://twitter.com/doyub?lang=en The first Two Minute Papers episode on Wavelet Turbulence: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5xLSb...
